title: _livecasino.io_
author: _livecasino.io_
content: Hello dear BitcoinTalk Community!Livecasino.io Promo  for this weekend is for 1 mBTC free bet for Evolution Crazy Time!!!Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk Promo #24 will work like this:Reward1mBTC Evolution Blackjack Free Chip!How?Opt-in by sending  PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BitcoinTalk promo #24 as PM subject to facilitate the management)Make at least 1 depositWager at least 10 mBTC on any games at Livecasino.ioPromo durationThis Promo will be running from the time of this post to Sunday 24th July, 23:59 GMTRulesAll BitcoinTalk users can participateMulti accounts will not be eligible for the reward The reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Monday 25th July, 17:00 GMTAll bets and winnings will be withdrawable from the freebetDue to Game Providers country restrictions, some participants may have to receive a different, but equivalent rewardNormal livecasino.io terms and conditions still apply, including multi-account restrictionsWe hope you enjoy!Flávio from livecasino.io team
